item.description:
We are a group of runners and triathletes training for the Amica marathon and half marathon in Newport, RI on October 17th, and the Cranberry Trifest on August 28th/20th. Our coaches are devoted to getting you in the best shape of your life in a non-intimidating, fun, and safe environment.
Ask anyone who has completed their goal of getting in shape to complete a half or full marathon, and I'm sure they will tell you it has truly changed their life. You will feel more fit, happier, and mentally much stronger; and all in a short 24 weeks.
Important note: We are a seasonal training program and there is a fee to join ($90 for marathon program, $120 for ATP program, $130 for triathlon program). The 2010 training starts May 8th. You can register either on our website (www.bostonfit.net) or via check/cash on the morning of May 8th. We then meet regularly as a group until the completion of the respective events.
Much more information is on our website, at: www.bostonfit.net.
If this is right for you, we look forward to seeing you!
Sincerely, Debbie

topics_item.name: Marathon and Half Marathon training program

item.name: Boston Fit Marathon, Half Marathon, and Triathlon Training
